means: 提供，供给，供应( provide的现在分词)

sentence.Network_en: The spade and fork have longer shafts, providing better leverage.
sentence.Network_cn: 锹和耙的手柄较长，可发挥较好的杠杆作用。

sentence.Network_en: The larger firm was capable of providing a better range of services.
sentence.Network_cn: 较大的公司能够提供一系列更好的服务。

sentence.Network_en: Newspapers, television and radio are all providing saturation coverage.
sentence.Network_cn: 报纸、电视和电台全都在铺天盖地地报道。

entry.def: If you say that something will happen providing or providing that something else happens, you mean that the first thing will happen only if the second thing also happens.

example.ex: I do believe in people being able to do what they want to do, providing they're not hurting someone else...
example.tran: 我真的认为人们只要不伤害别人，自己想做什么就可以做什么。

example.ex: Providing they do not panic, I believe that their chances of survival will be beyond 95 per cent.
example.tran: 如果他们不慌乱，我相信他们生还的概率将在95%以上。

auth_sentence.res_content: Providing grid services is just icing on the cake.

sentences.en: Providing that you exercise due care,there is no reason why you shouldn’t live to a great age.
sentences.cn: 只要你适当地注意,你就可享有很高的寿命。
